title: How much time ?
body:
Hi.My main account has hacked and moved to EUNE 3-4 weeks ago (gold 1 acctually).I created a new account , now im lvl 18 , i just want to say in how much time i get lvl 18 to lvl 30.

P.S:When the season ends ?
I want the border , all my friends are silver+ i'm the best (of my friends) and i got toxic hacked.

I play 3-7 matches per day , normally win 4 and lose 3.
I play 4-5 hours per day.
I buyed 1 xp boost 
And i will buy 1 at lvl 19 to make it easier.

replies.body:
Hey Try 2 Juke Me, 

Did you happen to send in a ticket to Riot Support about you hacked account? If you send in a ticket they may be able to help you recover it. 

Riot Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Good luck! 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
